BiblioEntry.Abstract: Problem naloge obravnava sledenje materialnih tokov v maloserijski proizvodnji podjetja Litostroj Power. Objekte (surovci, obdelovanci, polproizvodi) želimo identificirati in poznati njihovo lokacijo s pomočjo jakosti signala pasivne RFID značke, s katero opremimo objekt sledenja. Izvedba sledenja je možna na več načinov, ki so predstavljeni kot koncepti. Izdelana je aplikacija za določanje lokacije objektov z ročnim bralnikom, ki pa ni omogočal lokalizacije s pomočjo jakosti signala. To smo naredili z drugim bralnikom in rezultate predstavili v diplomskem delu.

Thesis is about tracking of material ow in small-scale production in company Litostroj Power. Objects (blanks, workpieces, semi-products) want to identificate and know their location with signal strength of pasive RFID tag, witch is on that object. There are several posibilities how to track objects, witch are show in thesis as concept. We made an application for getting location of tracking objects with hand-held computer, but it didn't support localization with signal strength. This part we did with another scanner and results present in this thesis.
